function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"High percentage of female respondents in all countries","Impact":"Potential bias in the data and results","Mitigation":"Ensure diverse representation in future surveys","Technologies":"Diversity and inclusion training for survey design","People":"Survey respondents, researchers","Owner":"Research team"},{"Description":"Age differences in respondent distribution between countries","Impact":"Risk of age-related skew in data analysis","Mitigation":"Apply appropriate statistical weightings to account for age distribution","Technologies":"Statistical modeling and analysis tools","People":"Data analysts, researchers","Owner":"Data analysis team"},{"Description":"High percentage of respondents with completed higher education in specific countries","Impact":"Potential bias in data towards higher education perspective","Mitigation":"Include perspectives from diverse educational backgrounds in future surveys","Technologies":"Targeted survey design and outreach strategies","People":"Survey respondents, researchers","Owner":"Research team"}]}
